column1: Uchi////You know Houston is FULL of delectable food - copious prime choices that leave you unable to decide even when you're starving. Uchi is hands down one of my favorite restaurants here
column2: and actually my favorite sushi restaurant in Houston. This place has just gotten better than it was a few years ago and I now relish my experiences here every single time. Pretty much everything here will not disappoint; even the onion rings here are the best I've ever had. One of my favorite nigiri's is the fois gras
column3: and a refreshing surprise that I would also highly rate is the avokatsu roll. The only problem is that this place is so good that it's always hard to get a reservation at a good time if you don't plan ahead; but hey
column4: that's a good problem to have - good food is worth waiting for. Thanks Uchi and keep up the great work!
